record.pwc_title: Compliance Resource Center
record.pwc_description: The Compliance Resource Center (CRC) can help answer your questions on meeting your professional responsibilities as they relate to Personal Independence requirements, CPA or CPE compliance, Independence Checkpoint, Central Entity Service (CES) and more. You don't have to go it alone -- use these resources find out how and when to contact them.

record.pwc_title: Ethics & Compliance
record.pwc_description: If you have an ethics or compliance question, you don't have to go it alone -- use these resources for guidance and support on ethical conduct, CPE, CPA, Personal Independence, Brokerage Simplification Program (BSP), Privacy & Information Protection, anti-corruption, anti-money laundering, antitrust and fair competition, insider trading, Government Ethics & Compliance, Records & Information Management and many other ethics and compliance topics.

record.pwc_title: Ethics HelpLine
record.pwc_description: Speaking up and taking action when we see or hear something that doesn't feel right is a fundamental principle at the firm and helps us to continually protect and build trust in our brand. PwC offers many resources for you to ask a question or report an ethical concern including the Ethics HelpLine.

Digital Story
record.pwc_description:
It’s one thing to have a digital mindset—it’s another to live it in everything you do—in our business, with our clients and in every aspect of how we work. We've taken the story of our digitization and are bringing it to life through the services and solutions we offer our clients and the tools we use to make our lives easier.
Technology brings us closer, makes us faster, helps us work smarter.

record.pwc_title: Digital Hub
record.pwc_description: The Digital Hub is the central resource for everything you need to take your Digital Upskilling game to the next level. Digital Upskilling is a key component of our Your Tomorrow strategy -- helping us build the skills we need to thrive in a digital world and accelerate our progress as infinite learners by removing limits on what, where, when and how we learn.

record.pwc_title: Be well, work well: The Well
record.pwc_description: Everyday behaviors and habits focused on fueling our four dimensions of energy - proven to help us become and sustain our best selves.

record.pwc_title: Digital Lab
record.pwc_description: Digital Lab is a first-of-its kind, online, One Firm technology sharing community that serves as PwC's internal “storefront” for the full breadth of the firm’s digital solutions across Automation, Data, and Artificial Intelligence (AI). It allows our people to develop new digital assets and/or co-create solutions with peers -- which can then be leveraged and scaled across the firm.

record.pwc_title: Your Tomorrow Commercialization PRO

record.pwc_description: Because we're listening to our clients and to our people, we're changing and evolving for the future. We're taking action so our firm will be strong and able to provide us with opportunities for many years to come.

They are designed to recognize the growth you've achieved and the contributions you've made.

record.pwc_title: Autom-a-thon brings innovation on

Between the two events, these PwCers have sparked dozens of automation ideas that will save the firm thousands of hours.

record.pwc_title: Smart Pricing

record.pwc_title: Digital Story
record.pwc_description:
It’s one thing to have a digital mindset—it’s another to live it in everything you do—in our business, with our clients and in every aspect of how we work. We’ve taken the story of our digitization and are bringing it to life through the services and solutions we offer our clients and the tools we use to make our lives easier.
Technology brings us closer, makes us faster, helps us work smarter.

record.pwc_title: One Firm Risk Organization
record.pwc_description: One Firm Risk Organization (OFRO): Manage risk. Maintain independence. Act with integrity.

record.pwc_title: Platforms Navigator
record.pwc_description: The Platforms are how we go to market to address the issues that are top of mind for our clients. They allow us to take a One Firm approach, bringing capabilities from across the firm to address client issues in a differentiated way.

record.pwc_title: Deals Source
record.pwc_description: One place to go to find go-to-market materials, digital assets, professional development, delivery and engagement content. Deals Source brings the breadth our best thinking, resources and IP to each of our teams. Saving Deals Professionals valuable time, our new digital platform allows us to engage clients in a more consistent manner, making One Firm and One Deals interactions a reality.

record.pwc_title: Salesforce
record.pwc_description: Salesforce is a tool for managing accounts, opportunities, contacts, and marketing across the firm -- it works hand in hand with other firm tools to help us build and sustain our client network, track appropriate client relationships, and convert them into permissible business opportunities when the time is right.

record.pwc_title: Marketing & Sales
record.pwc_description: Resources, tools and thought leadership that can be leveraged in winning and doing work.

record.pwc_title: Digital Lab
record.pwc_description: Digital Lab is a first-of-its kind, online, One Firm technology sharing community that serves as PwC's internal “storefront” for the full breadth of the firm’s digital solutions across Automation, Data, and Artificial Intelligence (AI). It allows our people to develop new digital assets and/or co-create solutions with peers -- which can then be leveraged and scaled across the firm.

record.pwc_title: Proposal CoE
record.pwc_description: Proposal Center of Excellence (PCoE) is your source for all things proposal.

record.pwc_title: Client Experience
record.pwc_description: The Client Experience (CX) is a key aspect of delivering the PwC Experience to clients. We focus on value conversations that provide a framework in understanding what is most important to each of our clients (and their stakeholders) so we can engage with them in a way that is meaningful.

record.pwc_title: Internal Firm Services
record.pwc_description: A resource to learn about IFS functional areas, career paths and connect with the IFS staff council.

record.pwc_title: Private Company Services
record.pwc_description: Your one stop destination for all the latest tools, deliverables and resources for the PCS practice.

record.pwc_title: Sector Navigator
record.pwc_description: The Sector Navigator provides sector and account teams with streamlined access to sector communications and premium sector content, including client-ready decks, thought leadership, social sharing, research, and leadership news.

record.pwc_title: Market & Sectors home
record.pwc_description: The Markets & Sectors team helps GEPs, partners and staff connect with the right expertise and collaborate across the firm. Access our market and sector summaries along with a directory of leadership contacts.

record.pwc_title: Tax home
record.pwc_description: The landing page for our Tax Line of Service. This home page provides an overview of our Tax Strategy, including Project 5 Million, and outlines how our Tax practice is structured. This page also includes links to additional tools & resources for Tax practitioners.

record.pwc_title: Tax Source
record.pwc_description: Tax Source is your go-to resource for Tax resources and tools to effectively manage pursuits and engagements.

record.pwc_title: Tax home
record.pwc_description: The landing page for our Tax Line of Service. This home page provides an overview of our Tax Strategy, including Project 5 Million, and outlines how our Tax practice is structured. This page also includes links to additional tools & resources for Tax practitioners.

record.pwc_title: Tax DMS
record.pwc_description: Tax Document Management System (DMS) is the primary electronic document storage system for all Tax engagement deliverables and supporting documents.

record.pwc_title: Tech-enabled Audit
record.pwc_description: The audit process designed to simplify, standardize, centralize, and automate pieces of the audit in Centers of Excellence, integrating all functions into a common workflow and leveraging dedicated tech applications. Our goal is to deliver enhanced quality, more value, and a more tech-enabled experience to our clients and teams.

record.pwc_title: Assurance home
record.pwc_description: The landing page for our Assurance Line of Service. This home page provides an overview of our Assurance Strategy, including our focus on Quality and a tech-enabled Audit, and also includes links to additional tools & resources for Assurance practitioners

record.pwc_title: Risk Assurance
record.pwc_description: PwC’s Risk Assurance Practice consists of more than 4,000 professionals with significant industry and technical experience across the risk and compliance spectrum.

record.pwc_title: Transaction Services/Deals
record.pwc_description: We help our clients identify and execute on the deals that accelerate their business strategy and generate value now and into the future.

record.pwc_title: National Quality Organization (NQO)
record.pwc_description: National Quality Organization (NQO) supports engagement teams on accounting and auditing matters, helping to enhance the Firm's ability to meet greater investor expectations with the challenges of an increasingly complex business environment and to inform and influence key stakeholders on important issues pertaining to the accounting profession.

record.pwc_title: Assurance home (test)
record.pwc_description: The landing page for our Assurance Line of Service. This home page provides an overview of our Assurance Strategy, including our focus on Quality and a tech-enabled Audit, and also includes links to additional tools & resources for Assurance practitioners

record.pwc_title: Digital Hub
record.pwc_description: The Digital Hub is the central resource for everything you need to take your Digital Upskilling game to the next level. Digital Upskilling is a key component of our Your Tomorrow strategy -- helping us build the skills we need to thrive in a digital world and accelerate our progress as infinite learners by removing limits on what, where, when and how we learn.

record.pwc_title: Vantage
record.pwc_description: Vantage is PwC's learning management system -- a personalized approach to learning all in one place.

record.pwc_title: Digital Badge Program
record.pwc_description: PwC digital badges -- a critical part of the firm's commitment to infinite learning -- are part of an expanding ecosystem of credentials being issued by forward-thinking organizations around the world. A digital badge provides 30 times the data on average compared with a traditional paper certificate.

record.pwc_title: TalentLink
record.pwc_description: Global talent and resource management tool that enables us to respond to emerging client problems with speed.

record.pwc_title: Leadership Development Experience
record.pwc_description: Monitor your progression, identify development opportunities and drive meaningful developmental conversations everyday. Explore the six key components of LDE that work together to help you bring out the best in yourself and your colleagues.

record.pwc_title: Workday
record.pwc_description: We have one human capital system for our global network. That means we can move faster when our clients need help, and we can focus on building the right teams.

record.pwc_title: Smart Pricing
record.pwc_description: The One Firm Smart Pricing site is our one-stop shop for all aspects of Smart Pricing strategies and resources, designed to help partners, directors and managers and all account teams convert rates and hours to fixed fee and other alternative pricing arrangements, where appropriate, for client contracts and engagements. The focus is on partnering with clients for value that reflects our investment in digital assets, intellectual proprerty, and our talent, rather than just time and materials, which only reflects cost not value. LoS pages on the site provide specific direction for each business area.

record.pwc_title: US Security
record.pwc_description: At PwC, our people are our most important asset. You should know that the firm is committed to ensuring the safety and wellbeing of each of our employees as well as their families. As part of this commitment, your Security team has developed this Spark page to help prepare your in the event of a disaster. We'll provide information, news and alerts, and ask for feedback to develop a culture that values safety and security. Every partner and staff member should feel that he or she is in charge of keeping the facility safe, and knowing what to do in a crisis. Additionally, your security team reviews and recommends security controls, policies and programs designed to protect the firm's people and assets. This includes managing the firm's background screening, crisis management, business continuity, physical security, travel security, security awareness programs, as well as providing investigative services.

record.pwc_title: Talent Exchange (app)
record.pwc_description: The Talent Exchange is a first-of-its-kind, technology-enabled marketplace. It gives our teams an on-demand platform to find, directly connect and collaborate with top independent talent. It's more than just a new channel to bring on third-party labor. It's a commitment to changing how we think about, and work with, independent talent. It is a streamlined, integrated platform that helps build durable relationships with independent talent while reducing our costs and improving our tax and legal risk posture. The Talent Exchange gives us the power to stay ahead of a shifting workforce, to strategically supplement and complement our existing teams with highly-skilled talent who enable us to continue growing and serving our clients in this new world.

record.pwc_title: PwC Translate
record.pwc_description: Working globally enhances our ability to serve our clients, provides opportunities for our people, strengthens our brand and drives growth, but it also presents language and translation challenges. That's why we are introducing PwC Translate -- a free, automated tool that instantly translates content between dozens of languages. Choose your origin and target languages from the drop downs, cut and paste the words, phrases or paragraphs you want translated, and with a click of a button you will have a translation. The tool has even been pre-loaded with preferred translations specific to the firm, such as how we refer to the lines of service and other PwC vernacular.
